Open navigation drawer Close navigation drawer Settings Standard Calculator Scientific Calculator Unit Converter Calculator App StandardCal ScientificCal UnitCoverter C ⌫ ÷ √ \u221B x² x\u00B3 10\u207F sin\u207B\u00B9 cos\u207B\u00B9 tan\u207B\u00B9 ± ↑ xⁿ eⁿ π UnitArea UnitLength UnitWeight UnitTemperature ( ) History Welcome to our application\nTo see the content of the application, open the side menu.\nThe app supports two main sections:\n- The first section is tutorial which provides the application the possibility of learning before starting a particular test.\n- Section II provides the possibility of solving any equation from one of the existing grades and solve them in the appropriate manner with the possibility of presentingthe steps to solve them and display a diagram showing the solution on the axis coordinates.\n - In addition to some other sections that support some small sports operations\nTo see more features try all the sections .. ^^
